# SampleConfs - Battle & Skills

Config files related to combat, skills, abilities, and battle mechanics.

## Battle Abilities
- **BattleAbilityBase.json** - Base ability definitions
- **BattleAbilityCombine.json** - Ability combinations
- **BattleAbilitySuitBase.json** - Ability suit sets

## Battle AI
- **BattleAIBossValue.json** - Boss AI values
- **BattleAIBossValueCrazy.json** - Crazy difficulty boss AI
- **BattleAIDefaultValue.json** - Default AI values

## Battle Barriers & Rewards
- **BattleBarrier.json** - Battle barriers
- **BattleBarrierReward.json** - Barrier rewards

## Battle Effects
- **BattleEffect.json** - General battle effects
- **BattleEffectBasePower.json** - Base power calculations
- **BattleEffectClassName.json** - Effect class names
- **BattleEffectSelection.json** - Effect selection rules
- **BattleEffectTrigger.json** - Effect trigger conditions

## Battle Functions
- **BattleFunctionList.json** - Available battle functions

## Battle Halos
- **BattleHaloAttack.json** - Attack halos
- **BattleHaloBase.json** - Base halo definitions
- **BattleHaloSpecialEffect.json** - Special halo effects
- **BattleHaloSummon.json** - Summon halos

## Battle Missiles & Projectiles
- **BattleMissile.json** - Missile definitions
- **BattleSubMissileTrigger.json** - Sub-missile triggers

## Battle Shots (Special Attacks)
- **BattleShot96.json**
- **BattleShot97.json**
- **BattleShot98.json**
- **BattleShot99.json**

## Battle Skills - Core
- **BattleSkillAttack.json** - Attack skills
- **BattleSkillBase.json** - Base skill definitions
- **BattleSkillCombine.json** - Skill combinations
- **BattleSkillCondition.json** - Skill conditions
- **BattleSkillCost.json** - Skill costs
- **BattleSkillDifficult.json** - Difficulty modifiers
- **BattleSkillEffect.json** - Skill effects
- **BattleSkillFlashCost.json** - Flash skill costs
- **BattleSkillForget.json** - Skill forgetting
- **BattleSkillLevel.json** - Skill levels
- **BattleSkillMastery.json** - Skill mastery
- **BattleSkillRealizeCost.json** - Realization costs
- **BattleSkillSub.json** - Sub-skills
- **BattleSkillTrain.json** - Skill training
- **BattleSkillValue.json** - Skill values

## Battle Skill Prefixes
- **BattleSkillPrefixLevel.json** - Prefix levels
- **BattleSkillPrefixName.json** - Prefix names
- **BattleSkillPrefixValue.json** - Prefix values

## Battle Steps & Sequences
- **BattleStepBase.json** - Base step definitions
- **BattleStepCombine.json** - Step combinations
- **BattleStepEntry.json** - Entry points
- **BattleStepParameter.json** - Step parameters

## Battle Trails (Visual Effects)
- **BattleTrail10.json** through **BattleTrail41.json** (30+ files)
- **BattleTrail70.json**
- **BattleTrail802.json** through **BattleTrail806.json** (5 files)
- **BattleTrail901.json** through **BattleTrail907.json** (7 files)

## Battle Units
- **BattleUnitAttr.json** - Unit attributes
- **BattleUnitBase.json** - Base unit stats
- **BattleUnitDrop.json** - Unit drops
- **BattleUnitLevel.json** - Unit levels

## Battle Values
- **BattleValueScale.json** - Value scaling

## Field Skills (Non-Combat)
- **FieldSkillBase.json** - Base field skills
- **FieldSkillItem.json** - Field skill items
- **FieldSkillType.json** - Field skill types

## Skill Systems
- **SkillCombineGrade.json** - Combination grades
- **SkillEffectDesc.json** - Effect descriptions

## Special Skills
- **SpecificBattleSkill.json** - Specific battle skills
- **SpecificSkillAttack.json** - Specific attacks

---

**Total:** 150+ files
